select s.id as id, s.code, s.name, s.parent_id as parentId, s.is_inner as isInner, s.resource_id as resourceId, s.sort, s.url from pt_sys_base_custom_form s where s.delflag='0' and s.status='1'
and s.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%' )
and s.parent_id = #{parentId}
order by s.sort

select s.id as id, s.create_person_id as createPersonId, s.create_person_name as createPersonName, s.create_date as createDate, s.update_person_id as updatePersonId, s.update_person_name as updatePersonName, s.update_date as updateDate, s.delflag as delflag, s.concurrency_version as concurrencyVersion, s.code, s.name, s.parent_id as parentId, t.name as parentName, s.sort, s.tend_id as tendId, s.is_inner as isInner, s.resource_id as resourceId, s.resource_name as resourceName, s.url, s.status from pt_sys_base_custom_form s left join pt_sys_base_custom_form_group t on s.parent_id = t.id where s.delflag='0' and t.delflag='0'
and (s.parent_id =#{parentId} OR t.parent_id=#{parentId})
and (s.code like CONCAT('%',#{searchKeywords},'%' ) or s.name like CONCAT('%',#{searchKeywords},'%' ))
order by s.sort limit #{start},#{limit}

select count(1) from pt_sys_base_custom_form s left join pt_sys_base_custom_form_group t on s.parent_id = t.id where s.delflag='0' and t.delflag='0'
and (s.parent_id =#{parentId} OR t.parent_id=#{parentId})
and (s.code like CONCAT('%',#{searchKeywords},'%' ) or s.name like CONCAT('%',#{searchKeywords},'%' ))
order by s.sort
SELECT max(s.sort) FROM pt_sys_base_custom_form s where s.parent_id=#{parentId}
select s.id,s.NAME,s.parent_id as parentId from pt_sys_base_custom_form s ORDER BY s.sort
SELECT count(1) FROM pt_sys_base_custom_form_instance s where s.delflag='0' and s.custom_form_id = #{id}
